<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The peasants still went that way, by instinct; in summer</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">in spring; in summer in winter. The old Gods still lay behind the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Christian God. The Pagan gods were served and worshipped <add hand="ms" place="inline">under cover of</add></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">at the same time <add hand="ms" place="above">the Christian God</add>. The sun was a God; the earth a 
            <choice>

            </choice>.</l>
